body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Looking for how to get involved at César E. Chávez? Browse through the website navigation or use the search tool to find opportunities.   NPS Centennial The National Park Service turns 100 on August 25, 2016. As we lead up to the centennial, we invite you to participate in Find Your Park Experiences to learn, discover, be inspired, or simply have fun in national parks.    Planning The National Park Service has conducted a study of other significant historic sites related to César Chávez and the farm worker movement.
